short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add PDFs to your research ideas on researchaideas.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension streamlines the process of adding PDF files to research projects on researchaideas.com. Users can log in to their ResearchAIdeas account directly through the extension's popup interface. When browsing a PDF online, users simply click the extension icon, select their desired research idea and literature directory from dropdown menus, and then click "Add PDF to Project." The extension automatically uploads the PDF to the chosen project, eliminating the need for manual downloads and uploads. This tool is designed to save time and enhance organization for researchers by allowing them to quickly capture and categorize relevant PDF resources they find during their online research sessions.
